body_html: It would be better to specify the correct values of allocation ids when run with MKL instead of skipping the test. It is OK if these values are different from those when run without MKL, as long, as they are consistent across MKL runs. Could you please make this change.

body: It would be better to specify the correct values of allocation ids when run with MKL instead of skipping the test. It is OK if these values are different from those when run without MKL, as long, as they are consistent across MKL runs. Could you please make this change.
